dataIdInfo.idAbs: Makes a feature layer from a netCDF file which contains trajectory data (e.g. a flight or ship path).

tool.name: MakeNetCDFTrajectoryPointsLayer

param.name: in_variables
param.dialogReference: The netCDF variables to be added as fields in the attribute table of the output feature layer.
param.pythonReference: The netCDF variables to be added as fields in the attribute table of the output feature layer.

tool.summary: Makes a feature layer from a netCDF file which contains trajectory data (e.g. a flight or ship path).
tool.usage: • This tool assumes that the input netCDF file conforms to the NetCDF Climate and Forecast (CF) Metadata Conventions Version 1.6.

scriptExample.title: MakeNetCDFTrajectoryPointsLayer example 1 (Python window)
scriptExample.para: Creates a feature layer from a netCDF file.

scriptExample.title: MakeNetCDFTrajectoryPointsLayer example 2 (stand-alone script)
scriptExample.para: Creates a feature layer from a netCDF file.
scriptExample.code:
# MakeNetCDFTrajectoryPointsLayer_Ex_02.py # Description: Create a feature layer from a netCDF file. # Requirements: None
# Import system modules import arcpy
# Import custom toolbox arcpy.ImportToolbox("c:/tools/Multidimension Supplemental Tools.pyt")
# Set local variables inNetCDFFile = "C:/data/netcdf/boat.nc" inVariables = "wave_height,temperature" outFeatureLayer = "c:/output/wave_temp_layer"
#Execute MakeNetCDFTrajectoryPointsLayer arcpy.MakeNetCDFTrajectoryPointsLayer_mds(inNetCDFFile, inVariables, outFeatureLayer)
